meanings.definition: Superlative form of tiddly: very small or tiny.
meanings.sent1: The ant carried the tiddliest crumb back to its nest.
meanings.sent2: The fairy left a trail of tiddliest footprints in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The tiddliest kitten tried to play with a big ball of yarn.
meanings.sent4: Her tiddliest earrings sparkled like miniature stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The tiddliest seed grew into the tallest sunflower in the garden.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of tiddly: slightly drunk or tipsy.
meanings.sent1: After one sip of champagne, she felt tiddliest.
meanings.sent2: He was the tiddliest at the party after just a glass of wine.
meanings.sent3: The tiddliest squirrel stumbled around the tree after eating fermented berries.
meanings.sent4: The room spun around her, making her feel tiddliest than ever.
meanings.sent5: His laughter became tiddliest as the night went on.
